web_snippets: In this episode, I'm joined by Bill Griffing—though you might know him better as Griff—the dedicated force behind the Spared and Shared project.
In this episode, Griff (Bill Griffing), the mind behind the Spared and Shared websites, shares how he turned his post-retirement passion for Civil War history ...
